title: Brilliant
review: Perfect product in reasonable price compared to market price .. reached on time . Installation done immediately. Working condition is very good .  I got it for 32k . Great price with copper condenser. Completely satisfied .

title: Bad quality
review: Product ia good, but pathetic service by jeeves (installation and demo team). Charging Rs. 500 extra for vist my place. Also Flipkart can't solve the problem.
